You can share your project as an App with family, friends and customers. \u2022 Set everything up\n\u2022 Activate your New App Your friends will get a link and be able to use it.\n\nHappy Blynking! Send them a link, they scan it and your Project magically opens They will need to download Blynk app Every time you update the Project, your users will get an instant update. You can boost performance and increase security by using local Blynk Server.\nIt\'s easy and free. Single Face Blynk.Faces Make App Create App Preview Start App Preview Help App Preview @string/prompt_new_app @string/prompt_multifaces Blynk.Inject™ App preview is ready Build your own App Project App Name New App Choose temporary icon Choose color Choose base theme Provisioning type Choose projects Choose project @string/prompt_export_provisioning App type Base Theme Primary Color LIGHT DARK Static Dynamic Your App is ready Check your email for the instructions on how to prepare your firmware. My firmware is ready and uploaded Preview later App Name Every project you build in Blynk can be exported into your own Mobile App.\n\nThen it can be published to app stores with your icon, logo, colors, etc.\n\nStart by creating App Preview and learn how to prepare and test everything before publishing. Use it for WiFi devices that can act as a WiFi Access Point. For example: ESP8266 and similar.\n\nBlynk.Inject™ will help your customers to connect device to home WiFi network and will dynamically generate new Auth Token. Static Auth Token is used for devices that connect to the Internet over the Ethernet cable or Cellular network.\n\nIn this workflow, every device should be pre-flashed with Auth Token.\n\nYou will receive new Auth Tokens to your email address. Choose one of your Projects to include in the app.\n\nYou can also enable Blynk.Faces™ - a feature to include multiple Projects inside a single app, which will work for different clients or with multiple products.\n\nEvery Project you add becomes a new Face in your app. Static Auth Token Dynamic Auth Token Remove Preview App Edit Preview App %s Preview Learn More App Preview is FREE Device Provisioning Every device on Blynk IoT platform requires Auth Token.\n\nBlynk.Inject™ is a workflow to generate and assign Auth Tokens to devices after your product is ready. It also helps your customers to get the product connected to the Internet. I understand how Blynk.Inject™ works Are you sure you want to remove app preview?\nIt won\'t be accessible for anyone. My Apps Publish Preview Another awesome app! Let\'s publish it. App publishing is a paid service Check out our plans at blynk.io blynk.io Send Request We will contact you shortly Thanks Projects Start by scanning provided QR-code Scan QR-code Can\'t add new Face. Please try again later. Check your email. Couldn\'t sent Auth Token your email address. Dynamic Provisioning is not supported by the Faces you selected Try again You will be able to upload your own icon before publishing to app stores Update Apps Apps are updated Updating… Apps update failed Here you can add troubleshooting guide for your product Theme Deleting the Preview Application will affect your Application and it will no longer work correctly.\nPlease make sure that this Preview Application is no longer needed and is not used by any application before deleting it! Account is needed to provide you with a reliable and secure access to your hardware from anywhere in the world, no matter which device or OS you use.\n\nIf you need more privacy you can install your own Private Blynk Server and run it locally.\nIt\'s free, open-source, and you can install it in 1 minute. Read more about Private Blynk Server Why do I need an account? Close Are you sure you want to exit?\nYou will need to re-scan the QR-code again Check BOARD_VENDOR field. Check the entered password and network.\nTry another Wi-Fi network or device.\nCheck the Internet and firewall settings. Make sure the board has sufficient power or does not restart during Dynamic Provisioning flow. Thanks for choosing SparkFun hardware! Enjoy the complimentary 15,000 of Energy! 1. Power up SparkFun Blynk Board by connecting USB cable to a computer or wall adapter.\n\n2. Check that the board is blinking a four color sequence.\n\n3. Make sure your smartphone is connected to the Internet. Choose your device. It should be named \"BlynkMe\" Connecting to\n %s Connected to\n %s Choose WiFi network to connect your device to.
